title: Castle Clinton National Monument: Multimedia Presentations
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Multimedia Presentations              Multimedia Presentations               Becoming Castle Garden    How does a fort become something else? Castle Clinton has been used and reused many times. This audio essay explores its first big transformation.  Duration:4 minutes, 25 seconds     Credit/ Author: NPS - CACL   Date created: 2012-07-31   Download Original File: CACL-Podcast.mp3 2,125 KB              Podcast Scripts Episode 1 - Becoming Castle Garden             1842     We often look at an event or a place in terms of its entire history - here, we explore one year, 1842, and the minutia therein.  Duration:2 minutes, 45 seconds     Credit/ Author: NPS   Date created: 2012-08-01
